text: Naxie zuotian hai xianmu ta [gao lun] de jingkuang de ren kaishi shuo:“Ni bu zhidao ma? An la yu shi ta de puren zhong shei fuyu, jiu shi shei fuyu; yu shi shei jiongpo, jiu shi shei jiongpo. Jiaru an la bu shi en gei women, ta bi shi da di tunmo womenle. Ni bu zhidao ma? Bu xinyang zhe shi jue bu hui chenggong de.”
